link_desc:
Zabbix template for COVER UPS

No MIBs required!

tested with model PMR 6kV, should work with other models too (and probably with more chinease made UPS that partialy use RFC-1628) only basic items, some triggers and graphs added as well.

Created in zabbix v3.0

Required value mappings:

  1. Battery Status

  • 1 ⇒ unknown
  • 2 ⇒ Normal
  • 3 ⇒ Low
  • 4 ⇒ Depleted

  1. upsOutputSource

  • 3 ⇒ on-line
  • 4 ⇒ bypass
  • 5 ⇒ battery

Alternatively, You can use provided xml and import value mappings.

Enjoy.
author: Piotr Zęgota
